reviewText: Agreed, the special effects should have been done better.  They keep showing the "wrong" guillotine---angling the blade was a big advance but the one they show is just horizontal.  Anyway I wonder about its accuracy because I can't corroborate some of the info on line, but basically I like it.  I wish they'd offer it in DVD because I've had VCRs eat 2-3 of these.
